text: Barbara Sołtysik (born 5 August 1942) is a Polish actress. She appeared in more than 35 films and television shows between 1962 and 2006. ==Selected filmography== * Potem nastąpi cisza (1965) * Family Life (1971) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Polish film actresses Category:People from Wadowice
title: Barbara Sołtysik
